alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman; Haywood; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:25AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE... NORTHWESTERN HARDEMAN...SOUTHEASTERN HAYWOOD AND SOUTHWESTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 500 AM CST... At 424 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dancyville, or 17 miles south of Brownsville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Whiteville, Somerville, Holly Grove, Hillville, Dancyville, Cloverport, Mercer, Medon, Asbury, Neely, Yum Yum, Huntersville, Hickory Point, Uptonville, Taylor Chapel, Teague, Leighton, Fayette Corners, and Laconia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
